course_description: Students learn the basic skills and techniques of street dance styles (such as breaking, popping, locking, house, new jack, and krumping) and examines hip-hop dance/culture as a social, concert, and commercial form. The course contextualizes the physical practice with lectures and discussions.
sections: Class Nbr: 1004, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTWThF 11:30a-12:50p, Instructor: J. Medina, Status: Open
